sense.def:
Z besedo
richly
povemo, da nekdo zasluži ali da je dobil nekaj dragocenega za tisto, kar je naredil.

seg.quote: It was a richly deserved honour.
I had seldom been so richly rewarded.

sense.def:
Z besedo
richly
povemo tudi, da ima kraj ali stvar veliko dragocenih ali zanimivih stvari.

seg.quote: These libraries are richly equipped with games and books.
